mapper.sql: id, create_time, update_time, title, cover, date_time, author, wxh, status, is_deleted
mapper.select: select id, date_time, title from t_health_article where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and is_deleted = 0

mapper.insert: insert into t_health_article (id, create_time, update_time, title, cover, date_time, author, wxh, status, is_deleted) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cover,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dateTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wxh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT})
